meanings.definition: Not organized or united in a federal system.
meanings.sent1: The small villages were nonfederated, each governing itself independently.
meanings.sent2: The nonfederated states had their own laws and regulations.
meanings.sent3: The nonfederated ducks in the pond seemed to have their own little society.
meanings.sent4: The nonfederated pieces of the puzzle refused to fit together.
meanings.sent5: The nonfederated planets in the solar system followed their own paths.

meanings.definition: Not part of a federation or alliance.
meanings.sent1: The nonfederated countries preferred to remain neutral in international affairs.
meanings.sent2: The nonfederated tribes lived peacefully on their own lands.
meanings.sent3: The nonfederated cookies on the plate were left untouched by the others.
meanings.sent4: The nonfederated stars in the sky shone brightly on their own.
meanings.sent5: The nonfederated students formed their own study group outside the main alliance.
